arguments.name: in_Config
arguments.type: System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e],[System.Object, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]], System.Private.CoreLib, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e

outline.annotation: Open applications used in the process and do necessary initialization procedures (e.g., login).

items.annotation:
Assign the folder path to the following variables:
-inputFolder
-tempFolder
-outputFolder

items.displayName: If Input Folder Exists and Delete Files
items.annotation: This "IF "checks if the folder exists; if it exists, it deletes the files inside the folder; if not, it creates a new folder with the corresponding name (Input)

items.displayName: If Temp Folder Exists and Delete Files
items.annotation: This "IF "checks if the folder exists; if it exists, it deletes the files inside the folder; if not, it creates a new folder with the corresponding name (Temp)

items.displayName: If Output Folder Exists and Delete Files
items.annotation: This "IF "checks if the folder exists; if it exists, it deletes the files inside the folder; if not, it creates a new folder with the corresponding name (Output)
